approach: Logical sections subdivided into 7-12s clips with narration slots

clips.narration: Here's the fave icon repository on GitHub.
Starting Claude Code
Now Claude wants to know if I trust the files in this project folder.
Welcome back. Now I ask Claude to read the to do file from the part one video.
Claude asks permission to read the to do file
Nine items total. Claude reads through the entire list.
I tell Claude to start with the high severity bugs first.
Claude starts planning the bug fixes
Claude begins by reading the source files.
Forty six Rust files to explore. This could take a while.
It's building a mental map of the codebase.
Searching for where colors are parsed in the code.
Found the color module. Reading through it now.
Still analyzing the color module
Now Claude understands the issues and plans the fixes.
